short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your personal digital coach for staying healthy and productive at your desk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you ever feel like you’re spending too much time in front of your computer and this is starting to affect your health?

Health Assistant is a Chrome extension designed to promote health and productivity for people spending many hours each day working in front of a screen.

Health assistant tracks the time you spend working and reminds you to:
- Rest your eyes
- Move and stretch
- Drink
- Take a longer break to restore your focus

Health Assistant works on Chrome browser, so it’s ideal for everyone who spends most of their time working with browser-based applications.
